name: BigCatStory
0:
”Alexa, open big cat story”
”Alexa, start big cat story”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big cat story
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson.
Ever wondered why wildlife are called 'game', maybe you would be considered 'game' too, just beacuase of your introverted nature and your tendency to avoid the crowd. Listen to this interactive story about a big cat you name, who drags a pursuer for miles, letting him survive the encounter, to tell people a story of respecting the privacy and lives of wildlife. Maybe you need to rethink your role in evolution, and realize that wildlife are sentient beings too , with emotion. Maybe they deserve to be left alone, in the woods, where they live, and not stalked and pursued in a 'game'?
 At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. 
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
